synopsis.text: Protect ing Earth from extraterrestrial conquest, Combattler V, a super-electromagnetic robot, stands as humanity's last hope against the invading forces of Campbell. Thousands of years ago, the Campbellians, led by scientist Oreana, left their home planet and landed on Earth. Now, in the 21st century, they have awakened and are determined to conquer our world. To combat their colossal biomechanical slave beasts, Professor Nanbara has created Combattler V, a massive machine controlled by five brave young pilots, including Hyouma Aoi. As the malevolent Prince Garuda, his mother, and their monstrous allies threaten to overthrow mankind, Combattler V's team must rise to the challenge and defend Earth against the impending invasion. The fate of humanity rests in their hands.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
